name: Savory Breakfast Oats Poha
description: Oats Poha, a delicious and nutritious savory breakfast recipe made with rice flakes, veggies and spices. Full of flavor and easy to make. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp chopped green chilies or chili flakes to taste (chopped )
1/2 cup other veggies like small carrots, peas, zucchini ( chopped )

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the rice flakes and old fashioned Oats in hot water, for 5 mins( just enough water to cover all).
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the rice flakes and old fashioned Oats in hot water, for 5 mins( just enough water to cover all).

recipeInstructions.text: Or you can make this with only Oats. Add enough hot water to dampen them and let sit for 2 minutes. A bit of rice flakes in the mixture help the oats stay separate and not clump up)
recipeInstructions.name: Or you can make this with only Oats. Add enough hot water to dampen them and let sit for 2 minutes. A bit of rice flakes in the mixture help the oats stay separate and not clump up)

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat oil in a pan on medium heat. Spread oil to evenly coat pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, heat oil in a pan on medium heat. Spread oil to evenly coat pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mustard seeds when the oil is hot. As soon as they start to sputter, add a few curry leaves and give it mix. Add 3-4 Tablespoons diced onion and chopped green chilies or chili flakes to taste. Cook until onions are translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the mustard seeds when the oil is hot. As soon as they start to sputter, add a few curry leaves and give it mix. Add 3-4 Tablespoons diced onion and chopped green chilies or chili flakes to taste. Cook until onions are translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add nuts and cook for half a minute. Add the chopped cooked(boiled/baked) potatoes and turmeric powder, mix and cook for a minute. If you don't have cooked potatoes, chop uncooked ones into smaller pieces, microwave them a minute at a time till almost cooked, and then add to pan, or you can skip potatoes.

If you don't have cooked potatoes, chop uncooked ones into smaller pieces, microwave them a minute at a time till almost cooked, and then add to pan, or you can skip potatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add other veggies like small chopped carrots, peas or zucchini. Mix and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add other veggies like small chopped carrots, peas or zucchini. Mix and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add soaked oats and rice flakes, salt and mix well. Cook covered on low-medium heat for 3-4 minutes. Open, mix well and cover and cook for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add soaked oats and rice flakes, salt and mix well. Cook covered on low-medium heat for 3-4 minutes. Open, mix well and cover and cook for another 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with fresh chopped cilantro and lemon juice and serve hot!
